Class IntegrationModel

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.integration.model.IntegrationModel
public class IntegrationModel extends Object
Model class for handling parameters and performing trapezoidal integration.
Author:
Sebastian Legierski InfK4

    Default constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • IntegrationModel

      public IntegrationModel()
      Default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • readArgs

      public void readArgs(String[] args) throws IntegrationException
      Reads command-line arguments for integration parameters.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments.
      Throws:
      IntegrationException - if any required argument is missing or invalid.

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady()
      Checks if the model is ready to calculate based on parsed parameters.
      Returns:
      true if model is ready, false otherwise.

    • setMode

      public void setMode(char mode)
      Sets the mode for integration calculation ('d' for divisions, 'w' for width).
      Parameters:
      mode - Character representing the mode.

    • getMode

      public char getMode()
      Returns the mode of integration calculation.
      Returns:
      The integration mode.

    • setDivisions

      public void setDivisions(int divisions)
      Sets the number of divisions.
      Parameters:
      divisions - Number of trapezoids.

    • setWidth

      public void setWidth(double width)
      Sets the width of trapesoids for integration.
      Parameters:
      width - Desired precision level, lower the value - higher the precision.

    • setLowerBound

      public void setLowerBound(double lowerBound)
      Sets the lower bound for integration.
      Parameters:
      lowerBound - The starting point.

    • setUpperBound

      public void setUpperBound(double upperBound)
      Sets the upper bound for integration.
      Parameters:
      upperBound - The ending point.

    • flipBounds

      public void flipBounds()
      Flips the lower and upper bounds if needed.

    • getLowerBound

      public double getLowerBound()
      Gets the lower bound for integration.
      Returns:
      The lower bound.

    • getUpperBound

      public double getUpperBound()
      Gets the upper bound for integration.
      Returns:
      The upper bound.

    • setFunction

      public void setFunction(String function)
      Sets the polynomial function to integrate.
      Parameters:
      function - A polynomial in the format "a*x^n + b*x^m + ...".

    • calculate

      public double calculate() throws IntegrationException
      Calculates the result of trapezoidal integration.
      Returns:
      The integration result.
      Throws:
      IntegrationException - if an unknown mode is selected.
